name: ASICS Gel Nimbus 25 (Womens US 8.0)
description: ASICS Gel Nimbus 25 trainers bought from ASICS outlet 8 months back n used for jogging. Have done 300km on them but should be OK for another 400km running n indefinite walking (giving cos long runs rub my toe badly). Almost no wear on outsole. Always worn with socks, no smell n not dirty. Lost original insoles (had own orthopedics) but have replaced with Hoka insoles that fit well.
